query.name: findByNameAndStudyId
query.sql: SELECT * FROM study_group_class WHERE name = ? AND study_id = ?

query.name: findAllByStudy
query.sql: SELECT sg.*, st.name as study_name, gct.name as type_name FROM study_group_class sg, study st, group_class_types gct WHERE sg.group_class_type_id=gct.group_class_type_id AND sg.study_id=st.study_id AND (st.study_id=? or st.parent_study_id=?) ORDER BY sg.name asc

query.name: findAllActiveByStudy
query.sql: SELECT sg.*, st.name as study_name, gct.name as type_name FROM study_group_class sg, study st, group_class_types gct WHERE sg.group_class_type_id=gct.group_class_type_id AND sg.study_id=st.study_id AND (st.study_id=? or st.parent_study_id=?) AND sg.status_id=1 ORDER BY sg.name asc

query.name: findDynamicByStudySubjectId
query.sql: SELECT * FROM study_group_class WHERE study_group_class_id=ANY(SELECT dynamic_group_class_id FROM study_subject WHERE study_subject_id=?)

query.name: create
query.sql: INSERT INTO study_group_class (STUDY_GROUP_CLASS_ID, NAME, STUDY_ID, OWNER_ID, DATE_CREATED, GROUP_CLASS_TYPE_ID, STATUS_ID, subject_assignment, is_default, dynamic_ordinal) VALUES (?,?,?,?,sysdate,?,?,?,?,?)

query.name: update
query.sql: UPDATE study_group_class SET NAME=?,STUDY_ID=?, GROUP_CLASS_TYPE_ID=?, STATUS_ID=?, DATE_UPDATED=?, UPDATE_ID=?, subject_assignment=?, is_default=?, dynamic_ordinal=? WHERE STUDY_GROUP_CLASS_ID=?

query.name: getMaxDynamicOrdinalByStudyId
query.sql: SELECT MAX(dynamic_ordinal) AS max_ord FROM study_group_class WHERE study_id=?

query.name: updateDynamicOrdinal
query.sql: UPDATE study_group_class SET dynamic_ordinal=? WHERE study_id=? AND study_group_class_id=?

query.name: getCurrentPrimaryKey
query.sql: SELECT study_group_class_id_seq.currval AS key from dual

query.name: getNextPK
query.sql: SELECT study_group_class_id_seq.nextval AS key from dual
